name: map
description: A comprehensive, interactive travel itinerary web application for a 4-day Langkawi vacation (June 16-19, 2025), featuring detailed route planning, embedded maps, and a modern, responsive design.

scripts.build:html: mkdir -p temp_html && cp *.html temp_html/ && mkdir -p temp_html/routePages && cp routePages/*.html temp_html/routePages/ && html-minifier-terser --input-dir temp_html --output-dir dist --file-ext html --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-optional-tags --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-tag-whitespace --use-short-doctype --minify-css true --minify-js true && rm -rf temp_html
scripts.build:css: mkdir -p dist/css && cleancss -o dist/css/global_styles.css css/global_styles.css && cleancss -o dist/css/diary_styles.css css/diary_styles.css && cleancss -o dist/css/index_styles.css css/index_styles.css && cleancss -o dist/css/route_styles.css css/route_styles.css
scripts.build:js: mkdir -p dist/js && terser js/diary_main.js -o dist/js/diary_main.js -c -m && terser js/index_templates.js -o dist/js/index_templates.js -c -m
scripts.obfuscate:js: javascript-obfuscator dist/js/diary_main.js --output dist/js/diary_main.js && javascript-obfuscator dist/js/index_templates.js --output dist/js/index_templates.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir dist && npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run copy:assets && npm run obfuscate:js
